summary:
## Orcas: Powerful Sea Predators

Orcas, also known as killer whales, are the largest dolphins. They have black and white patterns and live in oceans worldwide. Orcas are top predators, eating fish, seals, and even other whales. They live in social groups and hunt using clever strategies passed down through generations.

Although usually gentle with humans, orcas face threats like pollution and habitat loss. Some populations are endangered. Orcas are important in many cultures' stories.
title: Orca
